ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

I never thought a game would ever be able to make me wish it kept it's loot box system but here we are.

Also push sucks, the games are too long lol

[h1] Como preparar una lasagna [/h1]
600 g carne de ternera para guisar
300 g panceta de cerdo
1 cebolla
2 zanahoria
1 rama apio
200 ml vino tinto
800 g tomates pelados o salsa de tomate
50 ml leche
3 cda aceite de oliva
sal al gusto
pimienta negra molida al gusto

1-2 cda aceite de oliva
1 pizca sal
Bechamel
80 g mantequilla
80 g harina comÃºn
750 ml leche
nuez moscada al gusto
sal al gusto
pimienta negra al gusto
200 g queso parmesano
ELABORACIÃ“N PASO A PASO

Cortamos la panceta en cuadraditos pequeÃ±os. Pero primero quitamos la piel porque es muy dura.
Ponemos la panceta a fuego medio para que se vaya haciendo despacio.
Mientras tanto cortamos las verduras en cuadrados pequeÃ±os.
Â¡No olvidamos de remover la panceta!
AÃ±adimos a la sartÃ©n con la panceta un chorro de aceite. A ser posible el de oliva.
Y aÃ±adimos las verduras.
AÃ±adimos 1 pizca de sal.
Y, a fuego medio bajo, cocinamos hasta que la cebolla, la zanahoria y el apio se ablanden.
AÃ±adimos la carne de ternera.
Hacemos el fuego medio alto y removemos muy bien.
Una vez la carne haya cambiado de color aÃ±adimos 1 vaso de vino tinto.
Cocinamos hasta que se evapore el alcohol.
AÃ±adimos salsa de tomate o tomates troceados. Yo voy a utilizar los tomates que vienen enlatados enteros pero puedes utilizar la salsa de tomate que mÃ¡s te guste.
Una vez que la salsa haya empezado a hervir hacemos el fuego bajo y ponemos la tapa pero dejando un hueco para que salga el vapor.
La salsa hay que cocerla de 2 a 4 horas. Con mucha calma. Si ves que se estÃ¡ quedando seca aÃ±ade un poco mÃ¡s de agua o de caldo
He tardado en cocer cocer la salsa 3 horas.
SalpimÃ©ntala a tu gusto.
AÃ±ade la leche para equilibrar la acidez.
La salsa estÃ¡ lista.
PASTA CASERA
La pasta la puedes comprar o puedes hacerla. Yo te voy a enseÃ±ar como hacer la pasta para la lasagna.
Tamiza en un recipiente 200 g de harina.
AÃ±ade 1 pizca de sal.
Casca 2 huevos grandes.
AÃ±ade 1 chorro de aceite de oliva.
Remueve muy bien.
Termina de hacer la bola con la mano.
Esta masa no hay que amasarla mucho. Solo integrar muy bien todos los ingredientes.
La tapamos y la dejamos en reposo unos 20 minutos.
Antes de pasar la pasta por la mÃ¡quina la estiramos un poco con rodillo. Para mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre cÃ³mo hacer la pasta casera te invito a que veas este vÃ­deo.
Si no tienes la mÃ¡quina para hacer la pasta estÃ­rala con el rodillo.
El grosor de la pasta ideal es cuando empieza a transparentarse un poco.
Corta las lÃ¡minas en tamaÃ±o 10x12 cm. Me han salido 17 lÃ¡minas.
En abundante agua con sal cocemos la pasta. Yo voy a cocerla en 2 tandas para que las lÃ¡minas no se peguen unas con otras.
Cocemos la pasta aproximadamente 1 minuto.
La enjuagamos con agua frÃ­a.
La colocamos sobre un paÃ±o para que se seque.
BECHAMEL
Para hacer bechamel derrite la mantequilla.
AÃ±ade la harina.
Rehoga la harina 2 - 3 minutos a fuego medio.
AÃ±ade la leche frÃ­a y haz el fuego alto.
Remueve muy bien. En la leche frÃ­a la harina se diluye muy bien.
La bechamel hay que remover todo el rato hasta que espese. Para mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre cÃ³mo hacer la bechamel echa un ojo aquÃ­.
En cuanto rompa a hervir hacemos el fuego medio y la cocemos 2 - 3 minutos mÃ¡s.
Retiramos la bechamel del fuego.
Y la condimentamos. AÃ±adimos 1 pizca de nuez moscada.
Sal.
Y un poco de pimienta negra molida.
Para que no se forme una costra la tapo con un trozo de film transparente.
Rallamos el parmesano o parmigiano.
Precalienta el horno a 180ÂºC Ã³ 360ÂºF con calor de arriba y abajo.
Unta el molde o la fuente con la mantequilla. El tamaÃ±o de mi molde es de 24x24x6,5 cm
Cubre el fondo con la bechamel.
Coloca por encima una capa de pasta.
Por encima de pasta va el ragÃº o salsa de carne.
RocÃ­a el ragÃº con un poco de bechamel.
Espolvorea con parmigiano.
Otra vez ponemos pasta, ragÃº, bechamel, parmesano y asÃ­ hasta llenar el molde.
La Ãºltima capa cubrimos generosamente con bechamel y espolvoreamos generosamente con queso.
Horneamos la lasagna 45 minutos, los Ãºltimos 5 minutos con grill a 250ÂºC.
Antes de servir hay que reposarla 10 - 15 minutos.

back in 2016 overwatch was a game that really interested me, so of course, i bought it. it was kinda fun, but balance changes and new characters came relatively rarely. then, after like 3 years of the game being live, there were no more meaningful updates, only worthless, but cool looking cosmetics with some recycled content. the content drought hit. blizzard said, its for the better, because they are working on a sequel with 110% effort. they promised us the best pve experience a game could offer. later in 2022 they released a game, killing the prequel. this was overwatch 2, or as i like to call it, overwatch 1.5

basically, this new game was exactly like the prevoius one, except they removed features, and later reintroduced these removed features as "new" things, but now you have to pay for some of these "new" things. this new product had a lot of flaws, mainly some characters were unplayable for weeks. but really, the game i payed for was gone. no more. it was replaced by something objectively worse. overwatch 1.5 was no more than a monetisation update that sacraficed a lot of what made overwatch overwatch. but the worst part is yet to come

when the content drought happened, because blizzard promised us an unforgetable pve experience for a sequel. we patiently waited for it. hell, we would have waited for it 3 more years if we got a quality product. instead, we got the news, that those 3 years of absolutely 0 content happened for nothing. we were betrayed, not the first time, but this was devastating for a lot of people, including me. the entire existence of overwatch "2" was based on the promise of the pve. now that its cancelled, not only has the original overwatch died for nothing, but overwatch 1.5 has absolutely ZERO right to exist. the biggest disappointment in gaming history. never give a single cent to blizzard, they dont deserve anything after what theyve done to a game i genuinely loved once

also, it was decently fun to play. i really liked orisa back in the days, when we still had loot boxes. i never thought i will miss them
Have you no morals? No sense of pride? They rerelease a game to implement an item shop and a battle pass, and then tell you to go fuck yourself.
dont fall into this shithole of a game
